EmailTemplate.subject: Associate Mentor - Roc training email!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
This is the final email to confirm the details of Associate Mentor and Senior Associate Mentor training.
Congratulations on getting this far, We look forward to seeing you at training ready to take the next steps in acting as a mentor!
Please view the address details below, and see the attached University of Central Lancashire Campus map for directions.
Date: 29th May 2013 Time: 12:30pm - 3:30pm (Senior Associate Mentor training will finish at (4:00pm) Location: University of Central Lancashire Vernon Building Vernon St Preston Lancashire PR1 1 JQ
Please note the following ahead of the day: - Please bring a pad and pencil
-If you would like us to refund your travel to the site please keep your train / bus tickets as receipts -Please come with an open mind, ready to challenge yourself, and having thought what you would like to gain from the role -Please note that Associate Mentor Training finishes at 3.30pm, and Senior Associate Mentor training finishes at 4pm -Please arrive early to ensure we make the most out of the day -You will be find out the dates / location you will be working at during summer at the training event -Please call Dave on 07785623413 if you have any problems on the day
We look forward to seeing you at training.
Many thanks and best wishes,
The Challenge Society
